pages.title: Sabertooth
pages.text: Smilodon is a genus of the extinct machairodont subfamily of the felids.$(br2)It is one of the most famous prehistoric mammals and the best known saber-toothed cat.$(br2)Although commonly known as the saber-toothed tiger, it was not closely related to the tiger or other modern cats.

pages.title: Sabertooth
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Active during Daytime$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:beef$(br2)Number of Offspring: 2$(br2)Growth time: 6 Days
